sn35.69:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca upaseno rājagahe viharanti sītavane sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre.
sn35.69:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upasenassa kāye āsīviso patito hoti.
sn35.69:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā upaseno bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn35.69:4.4: “etha me, āvuso, imaṃ kāyaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā bahiddhā nīharatha.
sn35.69:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.69:5.2: “na kho pana mayaṃ passāma āyasmato upasenassa kāyassa vā aññathattaṃ indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmaṃ.
sn35.69:5.4: ‘etha me, āvuso, imaṃ kāyaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā bahiddhā nīharatha.
sn35.69:5.8: ‘ahaṃ cakkhūti vā mama cakkhūti vā … pe …
sn35.69:5.9: ahaṃ jivhāti vā mama jivhāti vā …
sn35.69:5.10: ahaṃ manoti vā mama mano’ti vā.
sn35.69:5.11: Tassa, āvuso sāriputta, siyā kāyassa vā aññathattaṃ indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmo.
sn35.69:5.12: Mayhañca kho, āvuso sāriputta, na evaṃ hoti:
sn35.69:5.13: ‘ahaṃ cakkhūti vā mama cakkhūti vā … pe …
sn35.69:5.14: ahaṃ jivhāti vā mama jivhāti vā … pe …
sn35.69:5.15: ahaṃ manoti vā mama manoti vā’.
sn35.69:5.16: Tassa mayhañca kho, āvuso sāriputta, kiṃ kāyassa vā aññathattaṃ bhavissati, indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmo”ti.
sn35.69:6.1: Tathā hi panāyasmato upasenassa dīgharattaṃ ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayo susamūhato.
sn35.69:6.2: Tasmā āyasmato upasenassa na evaṃ hoti:
sn35.69:6.3: “‘ahaṃ cakkhūti vā mama cakkhūti vā … pe …
sn35.69:6.4: ahaṃ jivhāti vā mama jivhāti vā … pe …
sn35.69:6.5: ahaṃ manoti vā mama mano’ti vā”ti.
sn35.69:6.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato upasenassa kāyaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā bahiddhā nīhariṃsu.
sn35.69:6.7: Atha kho āyasmato upasenassa kāyo tattheva vikiri;
